typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{entry no} as integer,
		customer_no as string,
		customer_name as string,
		item_no as string,
		item_desc as string,
		item_qty as decimal(18,0),
		sold_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
